metadata.Title: CVE-2018-5332 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
In the Linux kernel through 3.2, the rds_message_alloc_sgs() function doesnot validate a value that is used during DMA page allocation, leading to aheap-based out-of-bounds write (related to the rds_rdma_extra_size functionin net/rds/rdma.c).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-5332` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic - 4.15.0-10.11
linux-image-4.15.0-214-generic-lpae - 4.15.0-10.11
